articles.author: PTI
articles.title: De Villiers blames T20 cricket for short South Africa-India Test series - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "The players, the board and coaches will turn towards where there is more money," he said about the clash between Tests and T20 leagues
articles.content: News"The players, the board and coaches will turn towards where there is more money," he said about the clash between Tests and T20 leagues
